subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Ángel Cabrera of Argentina had the lowest score in the 107th United States Open and his name is on the trophy, but the name that should be engraved on it as the winner is: Oakmont.
snippet: Ángel Cabrera of Argentina had the lowest score in the 107th United States Open and his name is on the trophy, but the name that should be engraved on it as the winner is: Oakmont.
